page.title: 03CLOTHES
page.content: On school days in the winter girls wear a grey skirt and a white shirt and a grey or green jumper and a tie with green and white stripes on it. In the summer the girls sometimes wear a green and white checked dress with a belt to go round the waist.The boys wear a grey or white shirt and they wear grey shorts and long socks.When we have PE we wear green shorts and a white T.shirt with HIGHFIELD written on it.When I get home from school I wear anything I like.I normally put a skirt and jumper on or some jeans with a T.shirt and a jumper.When I go to play with my friends I sometimes wear a tracksuit bottom and a blouse. Then I put my trainers on and I take a jumper. At the weekends I go shopping in Langney and I wear a T.shirt,a tight skirt, a white jacket and high heeled shoes.{By Jemma Everett age 10
